column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=When I decide to bake a cake , I go all out .
#text=Nothing beats a homemade cake , the boxed kind are junk !
#text=It was no different this past weekend when i got the hankering for a chocolate cake .
#text=I first went out a bought the ingredients .

#text=They were as follows , 3\/4 cups butter , 3 eggs , 2 cups sugar , 2 cups flour , 3\/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder ,1 teaspoon baking soda , 3\/4 teaspoon baking powder , 2 teaspoon vanilla , and 1 1\/2 cup milk .
#text=I then greased and floured three 6 '' '' X 1 1\/2 '' '' round cake pans .
#text=I mixed together the flour , cocoa powder , baking powder and baking soda .
#text=In a different large bowl , I beat butter , eggs and vanilla like it stole something .
#text=Gradually I added the sugary goodness of sugar to the mix .
#text=Beating this on medium to the sound of fallout boy , I did this until it was well mixed .
#text=I then alternately combined in the flour mixture and milk to batter while beating .
#text=Continuing to beat until batter was smooth , I then poured equal amounts of batter into the greased and floured round cake pans .
#text=I tossed this delicious mixture into the oven to bake for 35 minutes .
#text=Finally I was able to remove the cakes , which I then placed on a wire cooling rack .
#text=Another 40 minutes passed , after which I proceeded to destroy all the cakes , eating every last bite until I could n't eat any more ! ''
#text=, `` Fun , this has been my favorite so far !
